# item(at:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the item at the specified index.

## Declaration

```swift
func item(at index: Int) -> any CPListTemplateItem
```

## Parameters

- **index**: The itemâ€™s index in the section.

## Discussion

The index must be within the bounds of the [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPListSection/items] array, otherwise, your app throws an exception.

## Getting Items

- **items**: The list of items for the section.
- **index(of:)**: Returns the index of the specified item.
